item.title: 特百惠品牌计划申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特百惠品牌公司准备最快于本周申请破产。【原文：Tupperware Brands is preparing to file for bankruptcy as soon as this week, according to people with knowledge of the plans, following a years-long effort to revive the business amid waning demand.】

item.title: 梅奥称银行债券走强为其股票提供支撑
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）分析师迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）说，为美国银行发行的债券利差收窄，表明信贷投资者认为风险降低，股票投资者应该注意这种看法。【原文：Tightening spreads on bonds issued for US banks is signaling that credit investors see less risk there, a perception equity investors should heed, says Wells Fargo & Co. analyst Mike Mayo.】

item.title: 巴克莱预计美联储作出关键决定前美元将反弹 1
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）外汇策略师斯凯拉-蒙哥马利-科宁（Skylar Montgomery Koning）表示，由于交易商高估了美联储降息的幅度，低估了周二即将公布的零售销售报告，美元有望反弹。【原文：The dollar is poised to rally, as traders are overestimating the extent of Federal Reserve rate cuts and underestimating a retail sales report coming on Tuesday, said Skylar Montgomery Koning, a foreign-exchange strategist at Barclays.】

item.title: 英特尔确认国防部芯片法案拨款 30 亿美元
item.description: 英特尔公司周一表示，它有资格获得多达 30 亿美元的美国政府资助，为军方生产芯片，这证实了彭博社早些时候的报道。【原文：Intel Corp. said on Monday that it’s eligible to receive as much as $3 billion in US government funding to manufacture chips for the military, confirming earlier reporting by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 被胡塞武装袭击的油轮在海上航行四周后被拖走
item.description: 一艘在红海遭到胡塞武装分子袭击的油轮在近四周后被拖往安全区域。【原文：An oil tanker in the Red Sea that was struck by Houthi militants was towed to a safe area after almost four weeks.】

item.title: 丹-弗莱德金重燃收购埃弗顿俱乐部的兴趣
item.description: 知情人士透露，美国亿万富翁丹-弗莱德金（Dan Friedkin）在对这家英格兰足球超级联赛俱乐部的兴趣降温约两个月后，再次启动了收购埃弗顿俱乐部的计划。【原文：US billionaire Dan Friedkin has reignited his plan to buy Everton FC, people with knowledge of the matter said, roughly two months after cooling his interest in the English Premier League club.】

item.title: 班普燃气公司 BKV 在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 3.15 亿美元的投资
item.description: 泰国煤炭和电力公司 Banpu Pcl 旗下的一个天然气生产部门正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集高达 3.15 亿美元的资金。【原文：A gas-producing unit of Banpu Pcl, a Thai coal and power company, is seeking to raise as much as $315 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 高盛交易员称现在是买入人工智能股的时候了
item.description: 人工智能相关股票最近受到了打击，但由于利率即将下调，而且基本面依然强劲，高盛集团的交易部门认为现在是逢低买入的时候了。【原文：Artificial intelligence-related stocks have taken a beating recently, but with lower interest rates on the way and fundamentals remaining strong, Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s trading desk thinks it’s time to buy the dip.】

item.title: Cherry 金融科技公司推销与 "先买后付 "整容贷款挂钩的债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着医疗债务需求的激增，支付公司 Cherry Technologies 正在为一种债券寻找投资者，这种债券将与整容手术和其他美容治疗的 "即买即还 "贷款挂钩。【原文：Payment company Cherry Technologies is sounding out investors for a bond that would be tied to “buy-now, pay-later” loans for cosmetic surgery and other aesthetic treatments, as demand for medical debt surges, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称将进一步降息但不会太快
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲中央银行将进一步放宽货币政策，但由于通胀风险挥之不去，不应操之过急。【原文：The European Central Bank will ease monetary policy further, though it shouldn’t do so too hastily due to lingering inflation risks, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 英国石油公司寻求专注于核心业务以提高投资者兴趣
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）周一宣布，计划出售其在美国的陆上风电业务，因为这家油气巨头正在缩减其在可再生能源领域的风险敞口，并专注于其核心业务。【原文：BP Plc on Monday announced plans to sell its onshore wind business in the US as the oil and gas giant scales back its exposure to renewables and focuses on its core business.】

item.title: 安大略教师基金招募新员工，与万事达卡挂钩的理财经理不断壮大
item.description: 万事达基金会新成立的资金管理部门正处于扩张阶段，其高管人员一直在从一个地方寻找新员工，这个地方就是安大略省教师养老金计划（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）。【原文：The Mastercard Foundation’s new money-management arm is in expansion mode, and executives have been finding new employees from one place in particular — the Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan.】

item.title: 软银支持的应用程序 Rappi 预计将在 12 个月内准备好上市
item.description: 拉美最有价值的初创企业之一 Rappi 公司的联合创始人西蒙-博雷罗（Simon Borrero）在一次新闻发布会上表示，该公司预计将在 12 个月内完成首次公开募股。【原文：Rappi Inc., one of Latin America’s most valuable startups, expects to be ready to launch an initial public offering in 12 months, co-founder Simon Borrero said in a press conference.】

item.title: 凯雷重启化工企业诺龙 IPO 计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. has revived plans for an initial public offering of specialty chemicals producer Nouryon, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as private equity firms globally gear up for a rebound in listings.】

item.title: 沙特 Maaden 公司与巴林 Alba 公司就出售铝设备进行谈判
item.description: 刚刚与美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp. ）签署交易的铝供应商沙特阿拉伯矿业公司（Saudi Arabian Mining Co.【原文：Aluminum supplier Saudi Arabian Mining Co., which just signed a deal with Alcoa Corp., is pursuing another transaction to swap two subsidiaries for shares in a Bahrain-based rival.】

item.title: 亚马逊首席执行官希望工人每周工作五天，团队更加精干
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）命令这家电子商务公司的员工从 1 月份开始每周五天回到办公室工作，并表示公司将设法减少管理层次。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy is ordering the e-commerce company’s employees to return to working in the office five days a week beginning in January and said the company will seek to reduce management layers.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制使用量降至 2,500 亿美元以下
item.description: 自 2021 年以来，投资者在美联储主要机构停放的资金首次降至 2,500 亿美元以下。【原文：The amount of money investors park at a major Federal Reserve facility dropped below $250 billion for the first time since 2021.】

item.title: 加拿大收益率曲线出现倒挂，美联储和麦克尔姆均有意削减收益率
item.description: 加拿大基准两年期收益率两年多来首次短暂跌破 10 年期收益率，原因是交易员们对美联储的减息政策进行了展望，而且加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）在《金融时报》上发表了鸽派言论。【原文：Canada’s benchmark two-year yield briefly dropped below the 10-year for the first time in more than two years, as traders looked ahead to Federal Reserve cuts and Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem made dovish comments to the Financial Times.】

item.title: 世界银行称津巴布韦需要经济稳定来推进债务谈判
item.description: 世界银行表示，津巴布韦需要至少 12 个月不间断的宏观经济稳定期，以帮助推进与国际债权人就其欠款 210 亿美元进行的债务谈判。【原文：Zimbabwe needs an uninterrupted period of macroeconomic stability of at least 12 months to help advance debt talks with international creditors over $21 billion it owes, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 沃特乌斯斥资 2.41 亿美元收购油砂钻探商 Greenfire 股份
item.description: 加拿大石油大亨亚当-沃特乌斯（Adam Waterous）以约 3.28 亿加元（约合 2.41 亿美元）的价格增持了该国的油砂公司，购买了 Greenfire Resources Ltd. 的大量股份。【原文：Canadian oil tycoon Adam Waterous increased his holdings in the country’s oil sands, buying a significant stake in Greenfire Resources Ltd. for about C$328 million ($241 million).】

item.title: 英国电网加速连接计划被批效率低下
item.description: 英国能源监管机构批评了该国电力系统运营商制定的一项计划，该计划旨在加快可再生能源项目与电网的连接。【原文：The UK energy regulator criticized a plan set out by the country’s Electricity System Operator to accelerate connections of renewable projects to the grid.】

item.title: 美联储减息前大量债券抛售，债券买方跃跃欲试
item.description: 上周，市政债券买家抢购了大量债券，他们急于在美联储四年多来首次降息之前锁定更高的收益率。【原文：Municipal bond buyers scooped up an abundance of debt sales last week, eager to lock in higher yields before the Federal Reserve is widely expected to lower interest rates for the first time in more than four years.】

item.title: 棉花跳涨，交易商因暴风雨和产量风险回补看跌押注
item.description: 由于恶劣天气风险和较低的产量前景导致交易商回补看跌押注，推动价格上涨，棉花期货飙升幅度为 2 月份以来最大。【原文：Cotton futures surged by the most since February as severe weather risks and a lower production outlook led traders to cover bearish bets, pushing prices higher.】

item.title: 巴西的廉价咖啡现在比高级阿拉比卡咖啡还贵
item.description: 世界上最便宜的咖啡品种正面临着巨大的短缺，其咖啡豆已经比星巴克公司青睐的花式咖啡豆还要贵，至少在种植大国巴西是如此。【原文：The world’s cheapest coffee variety is facing such enormous shortages that its beans are already more expensive than the fancy type favored by Starbucks Corp., at least in top grower Brazil.】

item.title: 捕食者 "间谍软件制造商招致美国更多制裁
item.description: 拜登政府官员称，"捕食者 "间谍软件产品曾被用于针对美国官员和践踏人权。【原文：The US has imposed new sanctions related to the Intellexa Consortium, a web of companies that makes “Predator” spyware products that Biden administration officials say have been used to target American officials and enable human rights abuses.】

item.title: 健康饮食浪潮 "推动增长，Sprouts 股价翻番
item.description: Sprouts Farmers Market Inc. 今年的业绩已经翻了一番多，Evercore ISI 认为，随着富裕购物者对健康饮食的关注，这家天然有机食品零售商的涨势将进一步扩大。【原文：Sprouts Farmers Market Inc. has already more than doubled this year, and Evercore ISI sees that relentless rally extending even further as the natural and organic food retailer cashes in on well-heeled shoppers’ focus on healthy eating.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席财务官认为下一个业务计划的支出 "切合实际
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司首席财务官费尔南多-梅尔加雷霍（Fernando Melgarejo）在一次视频访谈中表示，该公司下一个五年业务计划的投资水平将符合实际情况，并有可能增加公司的负债额。【原文：Petrobras’s next five-year business plan will have realistic investment levels and could possibly include an increase in how much debt the company can take on, Chief Financial Officer Fernando Melgarejo said in a video interview.】

item.title: 布凯莱发出零赤字信号后，萨尔瓦多债券飙升
item.description: 萨尔瓦多总统纳伊布-布凯莱（Nayib Bukele）表示，2025 年的预算将不涉及发行新债，这表明他计划实行财政紧缩，而这是与国际货币基金组织达成一项期待已久的计划的关键步骤，萨尔瓦多的主权债务周一跳升。【原文：El Salvador’s sovereign debt jumped Monday after President Nayib Bukele said the 2025 budget wouldn’t involve issuing new debt, signaling his plans for fiscal austerity, a key step in unlocking a long-awaited program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 马克龙有望赢得法国在欧盟委员会的关键职位
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统正在与欧盟委员会商谈，为法国设立一个新的、更有权力的职位，由他提名的人负责监督欧盟为提高竞争力所做的一切努力。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron is in talks with the European Commission to carve out a new, more powerful position for France that would see his nominee overseeing all of the bloc’s efforts to boost its competitiveness.】

item.title: 华尔街的早期解读将债务上限的最后期限定为 2025 年年中
item.description: 华尔街已经在试图计算，一旦债务上限在 2025 年初恢复，美国政府还有多长时间才能用尽其借贷权限，早期的预测主要集中在 7 月或 8 月。【原文：Wall Street is already trying to handicap how long the US government has until it exhausts its borrowing authority once the debt ceiling returns in early 2025, with early forecasts focused mainly on July or August.】
